title: quirky geometric sans
content:
Another unusual (but cool) san serif found in this months (US) GQ. I can't seem to find it.  
Any ideas what this is.

Font: 

 TJ Evolette 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317134819/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
